name: react-native-universal-image
description: A responsive image component with progressive loading for react native

scripts.adb: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && adb reverse tcp:8082 tcp:8082 && adb reverse tcp:8090 tcp:8090 && adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090
scripts.rr: npm run adb && adb shell input text "rr"
